# 1/2 times π

> One half times the mathematical constant [π][pi].

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var HALF_PI = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float64-half-pi' );
```

#### HALF_PI

One half times the mathematical constant [π][pi].

```javascript
var bool = ( HALF_PI === 1.5707963267948966 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
